name: Naramon
description:
Currently in pre-prototype build. 

4278 A.D.S (Arcaneum Date System) -- An anomaly was detected at Avarest Temple where the elements reside. As a novice elementalist, Naramon was sent by Council of Arcaneum to inspect the cause.

After a long journey, Naramon arrived at Avarest Temple. At a glance nothing seems out of place, but being an elementalist, you know that something is wrong. The element around the temple felt unfriendly and you can't even control any element. Some elementalist you are, you think. Decided to search for the cause you venture inside the temple.

This project is going to be the first major game project that Ice Eyes Game Productions will attempt to make. The game is a 2D side-scrolling platformer game that is made in Unity 2017.
